segments.text: I watch the boy stretch upwards, his face lit with excitement as he nears the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s brave, but I can’t help but think how easy it would be for him to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is watching intently, her hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how the woman at the sink can be so oblivious to the unfolding chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to pour over the counter, dripping dangerously near the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a disaster waiting to happen, yet everyone seems calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake the feeling that this scene is about to take a wild turn.
segments.speaker: PAR
